entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
